articles.author: Pravrajya Suruchi
articles.title: 10 stunning images of Andromeda galaxy shared by NASA - DNA India
articles.description: 10 stunning images of Andromeda galaxy shared by NASA
articles.content: This image of M31, our nearest major galactic neighbor, is the largest Hubble mosaic ever created, made up of 7,398 exposures from 411 separate telescope captures.
